comments.author: kilasuit
comments.body:
@evandrix - I believe that the reason for there not being a current build for win7 would be for similar reasons to why to install WMF5 (aka PowerShell v5) requires WMF (& PowerShell v4) installed beforehand.

That said I'm clutching at a straw with that response so hopefully someone else can respond with more details in due course
